Description: TransDecoder finds coding regions within transcripts
EDAM operation: Coding region prediction, de Novo sequencing, De-novo assembly
EDAM topic: Genomics, Gene transcripts, RNA-Seq, Gene expression, Sequence assembly, Whole genome sequencing
bio.tool description: TransDecoder identifies candidate coding regions within transcript sequences, such as those generated by de novo RNA-Seq transcript assembly using Trinity, or constructed based on RNA-Seq alignments to the genome using Tophat and Cufflinks.
